trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat is eager to set off for the Skydeep Cenote.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_01<tab>It has been determined that the gate of the golden city likely leads to Sphene's home reflection. The Queen of Reason has all but certainly retreated there, and in order to find her and thwart her plot, you and your comrades set forth for the Skydeep Cenote.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_02<tab>At the entrance to the cenote's inner chamber, Wuk Lamat cannot help but be struck by a pang of nostalgia for the journey thus far. The others join in sharing their feelings before you all proceed inside.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_03<tab>So it is that you come before the enigmatic gate to the golden city once more. You take your places as Krile prepares to see if her earring is indeed the key to lifting the seal. In conjunction with the authority Gulool Ja inherited from his late father, the earring serves to open the gate and reveal a portal to another reflection. With the way forward thus secured, it is decided that you, Wuk Lamat, Krile, G'raha Tia, and Erenville will be the ones to sally forth, and you gird yourselves as you regard the golden light into which you must step.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return via the inner chamber of the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_04<tab>With the portal's protection entrusted to your companions, you sally forth unto the unknown reflection that Wuk Lamat has dubbed the unlost world.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_05<tab>Mere moments after entering the portal, you emerge on the other side. Your breath catches in your throat as the scenery comes into view─a sprawling, dazzling city that could only be described as the legend of the golden city come to life.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_06<tab>Having composed yourselves after the initial awe, you set about exploring your surrounds. Wuk Lamat suggests following a nearby path to see where it leads.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_07<tab>As you and your comrades observe that the city is likely Alexandrian, you are approached by an Endless named Constancy. Introducing himself as a guide, he explains that the city is called Living Memory, and it was originally a recreational attraction for ordinary people before being repurposed as a haven for Endless. When Wuk Lamat indicates your desire to see Sphene, he advises you to seek her out at the Meso Terminal at the center of the city.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_08<tab>Sphene appears upon being called at the Meso Terminal, and Wuk Lamat pleads for her to reconsider her course. Alas, the queen refuses to be swayed and vanishes again, but not before revealing that she will erase the memories she has as a living person, that she might shed with conscience to become a devourer of worlds.

TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SEQ_09<tab>Wuk Lamat is dejected that she could not reason with Sphene. As you hear your friend's frustration, you find yourself wondering about the true nature of the Endless, and why Sphene goes to such lengths to protect them.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat at the entrance to the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat at the entrance to the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat at the Gate of Remembrance.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat yet again.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat once more.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GULOOLJA_000_001<tab>I'll bet it looks good on you!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KOANA_000_005<tab>These arms and armor are the work of our finest artisans. I can vouch for their quality and functionality both.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>With your shiny new gear, I reckon you're ready for anything!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>Come, let's head to the Skydeep Cenote!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KOANA_000_012<tab>Access to the area is presently restricted per my orders, so I shall accompany you.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GULOOLJA_000_015<tab>This place is a little scary... I don't know if I could come here alone.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>It feels like a lifetime ago that we were last here.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_025<tab>The city of gold. Where it all began...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_030<tab>And here we are again...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Koana has already gone inside, but I couldn't help but take a moment. Just being here takes me back.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>And it wasn't even that long ago that we visited for the rite. So much has happened since then.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_042<tab>Truly. Guided by my grandfather's letter, I crossed the seas in search of answers...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_043<tab>What awaits us on the road ahead, I know not. But I shall walk it to the end with you all.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_044<tab>...Come on, let's go.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GULOOLJA_000_050<tab>This power I've inherited, I'll use for good. I will!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KOANA_000_055<tab>Once again I must leave Lamaty'i in your care. Please return safely.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>I would dearly love to accompany you. But this time I will content myself with seeing you off.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Where you now go, I pray you find hope. I look forward to hearing your account upon your return.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>I'm needed here, I accept that. I'm not a child anymore.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>I'll spare no effort doing my part, so you do yours too. Together, we'll protect what we hold dear!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_080<tab>Twenty years ago I emerged from that gate. Whether or not the answers I seek lie on the other side, I will see things through.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_085<tab>I would be lying if I said I'm not nervous, but your presence gives me comfort and courage. I imagine your other travel companions often feel the same.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_090<tab>If Sphene is intent on plundering aether from other worlds, then our task is clear: we must stop her.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_095<tab>She cannot be allowed to harm anyone else. Neither those who are dear to us, nor strangers we have never met.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_YSHTOLA_000_100<tab>To be completely honest, it is all I can do not to throw myself into that light.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_YSHTOLA_000_105<tab>But I must resist the urge, for my presence will be required here should the gate close. It wouldn't do to lose everyone, our champion not least of all.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_URIANGER_000_110<tab>We who shall remain want for neither expertise nor experience. Worry not on our account, and fix thy gaze upon the path ahead.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_THANCRED_000_115<tab>I'll keep everyone safe. Just concentrate on your own task.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ESTINIEN_000_120<tab>En route here, I caught sight of a large lizard. It looked palatable enough, so I shall hunt it later.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ESTINIEN_000_125<tab>We can enjoy the meat while you regale me with tales of the world beyond after you've returned.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_SHALE_000_130<tab>I've done all I can. If you should meet Cahciua...please tell her I said thank you.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_135<tab>There's no telling what dangers we'll face, I know. But if my mother is out there, I need to find her. And give her a piece of my mind...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_150<tab>This is my world. My home...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_155<tab>Neither the void nor the First... We are indeed come to an unknown reflection.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_160<tab>The “city of gold” is an apt description indeed...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_170<tab>Amazing! Absolutely amazing!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_171<tab>We've literally stepped into the Yok Huy legend!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_172<tab>Whichever reflection this may be, 'twould seem the barrier between here and the Source is thin in Yak T'el.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_173<tab>That would explain the Yok Huy's visions and the location of the gate.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_100_173<tab>Hey, Erenville. That volcano over there─you don't suppose it's real, is it?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_100_174<tab>An actual volcano, spewing forth lava, in the middle of a city? I'd like to see that.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_110_174<tab>H-Hey, you never know!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_174<tab>Look, there's a path down. Let's see where it goes.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_175<tab>The people here. Could they be...?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_180<tab>There's no mistaking the design of this aetheryte.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_185<tab>I see electrope is used here too.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_190<tab>It's strange... Though I've never been to this place before, it somehow makes me feel nostalgic.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_191<tab>Unlike Everkeep with all its advanced technology, here it's brick and stone. It's like we've traveled to the past.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_192<tab>The differences may be more superficial than you think. Take a good look at the buildings around us.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_193<tab>There's electrope everywhere, along with myriad contraptions.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_194<tab>Like how Sphene projects her image onto soldiers, I believe this city's appearance is artificial.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_195<tab>This aetheryte is identical to the one in Everkeep, is it not?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_196<tab>This suggests that this place is Alexandrian.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_197<tab>That would seem a fair assumption. In light of all this, could it be this city is Everkeep's missing twelfth level?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_198<tab>(-???-)Welcome, friends! Welcome!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_199<tab>Who are you?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_200<tab>My name is Constancy, and like you, I am an Endless.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_201<tab>We have been recreated from the memories of those who have exhausted their souls─the departed, in other words.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_202<tab>Great effort is taken to ensure the integrity of your memories, so it will feel no different from when you were flesh and blood.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_203<tab>(Let's go along with it for now.)
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_204<tab>I am a caretaker here at Living Memory, city of the Endless, and it is my pleasure to provide guidance to newcomers such as your good selves.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_205<tab>City of the Endless... At a glance, there seems to be many different facilities. What kind of place is this?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_206<tab>Simply put, it is a recreational attraction. The city is divided into four areas, each of which captures scenery that once defined our continent.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_207<tab>In this way we ensure that what is lost is not forgotten. That all precious memories endure forevermore.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_100_207<tab>In Everkeep's early days, this place was used by the living, but it was made a haven for the Endless hundreds of years later.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_208<tab>Now then, if you would please follow me, I shall give you a guided tour. Do take care, as wildlife brought here for preservation roams freely.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_209<tab>H-Hold on a moment!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_210<tab>While a tour would be interesting, it's Sphene that we've come to see.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_211<tab>Oh, so you wish to meet the queen! In that case, you are in luck.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_212<tab>It was just announced that Her Majesty will enter into a slumber, but there is still time.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_213<tab>If you try calling to her before the Meso Terminal, at the center of the city, she will likely appear.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_214<tab>I'm not sure how things work around here, but let's head to this Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_215<tab>Our thanks, Constancy. We'll take you up on the tour next time.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_216<tab>I shall look forward to it. Good luck seeking out Her Majesty!
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_CONSTANCY_000_220<tab>Queen Sphene enjoys meeting her people. I am quite confident she will appear for you at the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_225<tab>Like the chamber in the Skydeep Cenote, the electrope here produces a strong golden light. A difference in energy levels, perhaps.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_230<tab>The plants are real as far as I can tell. Not everything is an illusion.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_235<tab>I wonder, can the Endless venture elsewhere, or can they only survive here?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_KRILE_000_240<tab>While Sphene's intentions are good, her methods are anything but. We cannot yield at any cost.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_GRAHATIA_000_245<tab>The Endless were unsustainable from the first. Sphene has been fighting a lost cause.
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_ERENVILLE_000_250<tab>The Endless exist in defiance of the laws of nature. But they exist nonetheless, with Sphene holding them to be no different from the living...
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_260<tab>Argh! What are we to do now, damn it!?
TEXT_KINGMF103_04948_WUKLAMAT_000_261<tab>I felt that I had come to understand Sphene, but I'm still clueless. Utterly clueless!
